page.title: 19TOURISM
page.content: Hayling depends a lot on tourism. We have asked a caravan site and a holiday camp some questions. The sites we asked were The Oven Caravan Site (OCS) and Sunshine Holiday Camp (SHC). QUESTIONS 1. How many pitches or chalets? OCS = 330 SHC = 341 2. What facilities? OCS = SH,T,SHO. SHC = SHO,SP,GR,OG,P, D,CA,N. 3. How many people come each year and/or busiest time? OCS = July,August and Bank Holidays. SHC = 14,700 a year. 4. How many employees? OCS = 0 SHC = 150 {KEY:SH=showers T=toilets SHO=shop SP= {swimming pool GR=games room OG=outdoor {games P=phone D=disco CA=cabaret {N=nursery.
